add-schema-config.description: Add `$schema` config to lerna.json if not already present to allow for IDE validation of lerna.json

remove-invalid-init-config.description: Remove invalid `init` config from lerna.json as it is no longer applicable, given init cannot be run on an existing workspace

remove-invalid-lerna-config.description: Remove invalid `lerna` config from lerna.json as it is no longer used for anything

remove-invalid-use-workspaces.description: Remove invalid `useWorkspaces` config from lerna.json as it no longer exists

remove-unnecessary-use-nx.description: Remove unnecessary `useNx: true` from lerna.json as it is the default

update-options-from-legacy-deprecate-con.description: Migrate legacy deprecated config usage to their updated counterparts
